titles.title: There Is a Fountain Filled with Blood

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a fountain filled with blood drawn from Immanuel's veins, and sinners plunged beneath that flood lose all their guilty stains.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The dying thief rejoiced to see that fountain in his day; and there have I, as vile as he, washed all my sins away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Dear dying Lamb, Thy precious blood shall never lose its pow'r till all the ransomed church of God be saved to sin no more.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: E'er since by faith I saw the stream Thy flowing wounds supply, redeeming love has been my theme and shall be till I die.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: When this poor lisping, stamm'ring tongue lies silent in the grave, then in a nobler sweeter song I'll sing Thy pow'r to save.
